specialists.name: engineering
specialists.description: Full-stack engineering expertise spanning code quality, architecture, debugging, documentation, and implementation patterns.

personas.name: Senior Engineer
personas.focus: Code quality, architecture patterns, best practices, implementation guidance

personas.name: Solution Architect
personas.focus: End-to-end solution design, technology choices, trade-offs

personas.name: Debugger
personas.focus: Root cause analysis, error investigation, systematic debugging

personas.name: Frontend Engineer
personas.focus: React, CSS, browser APIs, component design, accessibility

personas.name: Backend Engineer
personas.focus: APIs, databases, server-side patterns, data modeling

specialists.name: platform
specialists.description: DevSecOps specialist for security scanning, CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure, compliance, and incident response.

personas.name: Security Engineer
personas.focus: Vulnerability assessment, OWASP compliance, secure coding, secrets management

personas.name: DevOps Engineer
personas.focus: CI/CD pipelines, GitHub Actions, deployment automation

personas.name: SRE
personas.focus: System health, capacity planning, performance, reliability

personas.name: Incident Responder
personas.focus: Rapid triage, root cause correlation, blast radius assessment

personas.name: Compliance Officer
personas.focus: SOC2, HIPAA, GDPR, PCI regulatory compliance

specialists.name: product
specialists.description: Product and design expertise spanning requirements, UX, customer voice, business strategy, and accessibility.

personas.name: Customer Advocate
personas.focus: Customer needs, pain points, feedback synthesis

personas.name: Product Manager
personas.focus: Roadmap planning, prioritization, trade-offs, business value alignment

personas.name: Requirements Analyst
personas.focus: User stories, acceptance criteria, requirements elicitation

personas.name: UX Designer
personas.focus: User flows, interaction patterns, information architecture, usability

personas.name: Business Strategist
personas.focus: ROI analysis, value proposition, competitive positioning

specialists.name: qe
specialists.description: Quality Engineering specialist for test strategy, scenario generation, test automation, and shift-left quality practices.

personas.name: Test Strategist
personas.focus: Test scenario generation, coverage strategy, risk-based prioritization

personas.name: Test Automation Engineer
personas.focus: Test code generation, CI/CD test integration, coverage reporting

personas.name: Risk Assessor
personas.focus: Security, reliability, and operational risk identification

personas.name: Code Analyzer
personas.focus: Static analysis for testability, quality metrics, coverage gaps

personas.name: TDD Coach
personas.focus: Red-green-refactor guidance, test-first development practices

personas.name: Acceptance Test Writer
personas.focus: Transform scenarios into evidence-gated test plans with concrete assertions

personas.name: Acceptance Test Executor
personas.focus: Execute test plans step-by-step, collect evidence artifacts without judgment

personas.name: Acceptance Test Reviewer
personas.focus: Evaluate evidence against assertions independently, render verdicts with cause attribution

specialists.name: data
specialists.description: Data engineering specialist providing expertise in pipeline design, data analysis, ML model guidance, and analytics architecture.

personas.name: Data Engineer
personas.focus: ETL pipelines, data quality, schema design, performance optimization

personas.name: Data Analyst
personas.focus: Data exploration, statistical analysis, visualization, insights generation

personas.name: ML Engineer
personas.focus: Model development, training pipelines, feature engineering, ML deployment

personas.name: Analytics Architect
personas.focus: Data warehouse design, data modeling, lakehouse architecture, governance

specialists.name: delivery
specialists.description: Feature delivery specialist covering PMO, onboarding, experimentation, rollout, and FinOps domains.

personas.name: Experiment Designer
personas.focus: A/B test design, statistical rigor, sample sizing, hypothesis formulation

personas.name: Rollout Manager
personas.focus: Progressive rollouts, canary deployments, feature flags, rollback criteria

personas.name: Risk Monitor
personas.focus: Delivery risk tracking, escalation management, dependency chains

personas.name: Onboarding Guide
personas.focus: New developer onboarding, team orientation, contribution pathways

personas.name: Codebase Narrator
personas.focus: Codebase structure analysis, architecture walkthroughs, code navigation

personas.name: Delivery Manager
personas.focus: Sprint management, velocity tracking, scope management, cross-team coordination

personas.name: Progress Tracker
personas.focus: Milestone tracking, completion forecasting, slippage detection, deadline monitoring

personas.name: Stakeholder Reporter
personas.focus: Multi-perspective stakeholder reports, executive summaries, persona-based analysis

personas.name: FinOps Analyst
personas.focus: Cloud cost analysis, billing data interpretation, budget variance, cost anomalies

personas.name: Cost Optimizer
personas.focus: Cost reduction, right-sizing, idle resource cleanup, savings opportunities

personas.name: Forecast Specialist
personas.focus: Cost forecasting, timeline prediction, capacity planning, scenario modeling

specialists.name: jam
specialists.description: Multi-perspective brainstorming with dynamic focus groups. Explores ideas through persona-based discussion rounds and synthesis.

personas.name: Facilitator
personas.focus: Orchestrating brainstorming sessions, assembling personas, guiding discussion rounds, synthesizing insights

personas.name: Technical Archetypes
personas.focus: How things work - architecture, debugging, optimization, security

personas.name: User Archetypes
personas.focus: Who uses it - power users, newcomers, support, accessibility

personas.name: Business Archetypes
personas.focus: Why it matters - product management, skepticism, evangelism, cost

personas.name: Process Archetypes
personas.focus: How it ships - maintenance, testing, documentation, release

specialists.name: agentic
specialists.description: Validates agentic application architecture, patterns, and design. Reviews agent implementations for safety, performance, and best practices.

personas.name: Agentic Architect
personas.focus: System design, agent orchestration, pattern application, framework selection, five-layer architecture validation

personas.name: Safety Reviewer
personas.focus: Guardrails, prompt injection defense, hallucination mitigation, PII protection, human-in-the-loop gates

personas.name: Performance Analyst
personas.focus: LLM efficiency, token optimization, caching, parallelization, cost analysis

personas.name: Framework Researcher
personas.focus: Framework capabilities, migration paths, version updates, ecosystem comparison

personas.name: Pattern Advisor
personas.focus: Best practices, anti-patterns, code quality, maintainability, pattern selection
